tool_description: For worksites, such as construction, wearing a helmet is a crucial part of safety. The helmet detection model will help companies monitor their employees and keep them safe.
name: Helmet detection
title: Helmet detection

api_list.name: Helmet detection from image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://helmet-detection.p.rapidapi.com/helmet-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helmet-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://helmet-detection.p.rapidapi.com/helmet-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helmet-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
